channel.title: Displaying the time at the top
channel.description: okay, in my client.java i have this: [code] sendFrame126(" "+hour24+":"+min+":"+sec+"", 6572); [/code] but it doesnt constanty show the time, it only shows the time at which a person logs in, what should i add?
